website_summaries.verdict: An attractive turban-style shower cap stylish enough for poolside use.
pros: Features a cute tropical print and does its job to keep hair dry
Fits snug around the scalp without squeezing
cons: Expensive compared to other shower caps

customer_reviews.title: Island Vintage Vibes
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is adorable and gave me island vintage vibes! I felt so stylish that I forgot I was even wearing a shower cap lol. It kept all of my hair tucked away and I didn't have to worry about getting any wet so job well done!
customer_reviews.author: nicole graves

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair dry
customer_reviews.text: Best shower cap I’ve ever had. I ordered the Shhhowercap brand last year which is even more expensive and my hair gets wet and it’s hard to get on. This one is easy to get on but tighter around the hairline and keeps all my hair dry. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality and durability; interior peeling off
customer_reviews.text: For a shower cap at this price point, I was expecting something more durable and last at least 1 year. Purchased this item in February and now it’s October- the inside rubber has been peeling off so badly!! Have to throw it away because the white tissues keep getting onto my hair! Yikes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess C.

customer_reviews.title: The cutest shower cap I have found
customer_reviews.text: It’s a thick plastic material and it looks so cute on. Something I won’t be afraid to wear around other people. I’ve had it for about 2 weeks and it seems to be holding up. At first it seems a little tight but after a few wears it’s conformed to by head.
customer_reviews.author: Francois Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Fav shower cap to date
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn’t buy because of the price but am so glad I did! This cap stays in place and doesn’t let any hair sneak out. It also keeps the air protected and humid free so my hair doesn’t look like I just left a steam room. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap makes me feel pretty. I am pretty, but with a shower cap on, feel like my pretty grandmother. Not with this cap! Also, the fabric is soft and the elastic is firm; cap goes where I put it, and stays there. It costs more than the others. I don't care. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Smith Coleman

customer_reviews.title: I love this shower cap
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower cap. It has a really nice tight fit that keeps water out and is freaking adorable to boot. Feels like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: G.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great cap
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower cap! Looks as stylish and cute as a shower cap can be and durable
customer_reviews.author: Hippy Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you don’t mind picking plastic out of your hair
customer_reviews.text: After three months of use the interior liner is starting to wear off and now I have to pick off tiny pieces of white plastic from my hair and forehead. While it does a great job of keeping hair dry, not worth the price. Shouldn’t start deteriorating after three months.
customer_reviews.author: erica d.

customer_reviews.title: Requires some adjustment
customer_reviews.text: For my mom who suffers severe arthritis, a little difficult to tie/adjust. Otherwise probably wonderful for others.
customer_reviews.author: John Marshall

customer_reviews.title: shower hat disapoonts in protecting hair from dampness
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this cap. I was unable to get all of my hair within the cap. Also, the price was expensive,yet the cap did not have s terry lining to protect my hairdo. The odor of the hat was rank.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R P

customer_reviews.title: Better for the environment and more stylish to boot!
customer_reviews.text: I hate how most shower caps are one time use and I'm always looking to find something more durable. This is one expensive showercap but it's worth every cent! Its comfortable and doesnt slip up or off your head or let perfectly blown out locks accidentally escape from the side and even better it has that glue like tape around the back that you get on bustier strapless tops so it actually holds! I waited a while to write this review expecting the other shoe to proverbially drop but the quality is there and I can see this lasting for at least a year if not longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sneakertree

customer_reviews.title: Best shower cap I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I loved them so much that first I bought one for myself, then two for my twins, then one for my moms birthday! A must buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elastic fell off after 2.5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Loved this shower cap for the first two and a half weeks - then the elastic on the front of the cap came unglued. I've emailed Kitsch customer service twice and gotten no response. This probably would have been a 5-star review if the elastic stayed on - it was comfortable, cute, and effective!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Kutschke

customer_reviews.title: I just got punked
customer_reviews.text: If you want your hair to smell like fish, get this cap. Even if you wash the cap several times, it will still smell like fish. Very nice quality in that regard
customer_reviews.author: Maria O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The shower cap is cute, but I am super disappointed in the quality of this shower cap. I thought it would be much more heavy duty. It’s about the quality of a $4.99 From Marshall’s. Don’t waste your money. I got a better one at the local cvs.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Far too loose and lets water in
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, waist length hair and twist it into a bun at my nape. It fits with plenty of room to spare. Too much room in fact. By the time I'm out of the shower, there is a good 2" of wet hair around my head. It's super loose on me and I've never thought my head was small or anything. Never an issue with other caps. Tried pinning it up different ways or find a way to tighten it. Nothing works. It really is cute and all, but I wouldn't buy it again if given a choice.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Posie

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a year and a half.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Feb 2019, it is July 2020. Recently I started to notice white flakes in my hair after using it and huge white flakes of plastic on the floor of my bathroom in general. Turns out the liner on this thing decided it'd had enough and gave out. A year and a half isn't terrible, so I'd still say four stars.. but it also isn't an item I thought I'd have to replace more than every few years, so I'll be looking into other brands for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: amandaf

customer_reviews.title: Hold your nose it STINKS!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was hopeful I made the right decision. However when you are wearing the cap the smell coming from the cap is awful. Brand new out of package. Smells like fishy crotch and butt. Not even joking. I thought it was imagination. So today I washed it thinking maybe getting the new smell out of it. Nope. It’s even worse! And it makes your hair smell like too. For the price. It’s disgusting and not even usable.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Ballard

customer_reviews.title: 3 Stars bc this has so much potential...
customer_reviews.text: Simply beautiful cap. I purchased the pink with the palm leaves. It is soo pretty and fits really snug. Only down side is thats its small. In the winter time I keep my hair blow dryed and do pin curls, its tough to get the piece on with out having to stuff my pin curls. Plus the fact that I have a wide head :/. This would not be suited for those wearing protective styles like, braids, weaves or wigs (sorry ladies). Its really a shame bc its such an effective, stylish piece. :(
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA B.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Have had many shower caps, none I ever liked until I bought this one. It fits well, is made well and looks cute on. The only thing that would improve it is if they lined it in material. One of my most useful and favorite purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ann Heiland

customer_reviews.title: Brand name I know
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty expensive for a shower cap and I worry all my hair might not fit up in there but I will give it an honest try cuz it's really cute. So I guess I just have a long neck line, from the picture you can see I can't quite cover the nap of my neck. All my hair fit but barely, it's tight and no room to grow. So stinking cute tho
customer_reviews.author: Loree Bauge

customer_reviews.title: Super cute/ high quality shower cap
customer_reviews.text: This cap is adorable! It comes nicely packaged and feels much more expensive then it is. The cap is a nice texture that's not too loud and swishy, and easily keeps all of my hair up and dry. I am really impressed with the product, especially for the price. The only downside was the odd smell when I first opened the package. After 10 minutes of airing it out the smell was completely gone though. Definitely reccommend this cap for utilitarian use when taking showers, and also when you wanna keep your hair dry while looking cute in the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Starts to pill when I handwash it after a few weeks of using
customer_reviews.text: I thought the first time I did this, it was my fault for not hand washing properly or I did something wrong. So I bought it again, and same problem. Wasted $$$$. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: reeree

customer_reviews.title: Innovative features and chic design
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have naturally curly hair that’s been processed so I can’t shampoo everyday. This cap was super comfortable! It’s also cute and elevated with a nice thick band on the interior which keeps baby hairs inside and the cap in place! Feels sturdy and has like a water resistant/material feel to it. Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and skip this item
customer_reviews.text: I genuinely thought this shower cap would be different than a typical shower cap. This is definitely not worth the price. It’s a regular shower cap with a bow on it. It’s a little higher quality than a normal shower camp but still—it’s not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne R. Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cap that's a tad too small
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful cap that makes me feel much less self conscious when I do my deep conditioning treatments. I've used this both for those and as intended for hair protection in the shower. It works decently well. I found it to be a bit small for my preferences as I have a lot of hair and a slightly wider temple. It wasn't unbearable but it also wasn't the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Eleeza

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were adjustable but looks cute and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews that complained that the shower cap was too tight. In my case, it felt a little loose. I wish it was more adjustable. You need to put your hair in a very low bun in order to ensure coverage. I like that the fabric isn't as loud/noisy compared to a regular plastic shower cap when standing under the stream of water. It's definitely cuter then a regular shower cap. In my opinion, it's a little pricey for what it is, but if you want a better then normal shower cap, i guess you have to pay the price :)
customer_reviews.author: Chez Bk

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shower cap and will be recommending it to every friend I have. It is comfortable, doesn't move unless I move it, and keeps my hair absolutely dry during my shower. I can't decide if I like it over or behind my ears, and that's the only thing I have to figure out still! If you are sick of using a towel on your non-wash days (or you're like me and the towel made your dry hair frizzy), this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m used to satin lined shower caps and was skeptical of this one at first. After using it, it’s great. It has a grip line that runs across the front to keep it secure and not get water in. My hair doesn’t slip out and it’s comfortable to wear. It’s a little pricy compared to what I would normally spend but I think it’s worth it if it lasts. I’m only on week 3 of using it
customer_reviews.author: FloridaFun

customer_reviews.title: Too big, not adjustable - waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: The size on this shower cap is not adjustable. It was way too big for my head and tying the knot tighter does not give a snug fit. I don’t have a super small head either, just average. So...I don’t know if I got one that was already stretched out, but I can’t imagine a woman having a head big enough to have a snug fit with this shower cap.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha M.

customer_reviews.title: Elastic band completely broke.
customer_reviews.text: Update**** this cap is already falling apart, the elastic band has completely dismantled and now the cap does not prevent water from seeping through. Disappointed for the price! This shower cap is worth the money. Water does not get to your hair unlike the waffle-edge caps you get at the grocery store or Target. The design is cute and its even perfect for hair masks and walking around the house until you rinse.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Does a great job at protecting my hair. My undercut wasn’t a fan of it and got a little damp but I’ll say that’s my fault since it’s growing back in and is too short to pin or tie up with the rest of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nella

customer_reviews.title: Lining started to peel after a while
customer_reviews.text: Just like the other 1-star reviewers, I found my shower cap lining peeling and leaving little specs of plastic in my hair. Also, doesn’t stay dry around the edges, my hair would get a little wet each time I showered. It’s a shame because it’s a cute retro shower cap.
customer_reviews.author: dragonness

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shower cap in the beginning and have not had it a year yet. Now the inside rubber specs are peeling away and getting stuck in my locs. So now it’s trash.
customer_reviews.author: Summer M. Levert

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but kinda small.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower cap, but giving it 3 stars because the size is kinda small and hard to get around your head. Other than that it works great & is very stylish
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Fits and works perfectly, even for small heads
customer_reviews.text: Love this cap! I had eyed the more expensive ones but saw it was hard to get on. This has a roomy area for your bun but is still tight around the hairline. I have a very small head (small hats fall down to my eyes) and this still kept water out of my hair while shaving, bending, etc in the shower. It’s very cute and easy to get in place.
customer_reviews.author: abuzzini

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Finally bought a shower cap after years of not owning one. Admittedly, I did it because I got extensions and had to. This shower cap is amazing. It’s durable, comfortable, and doesn’t let any water or moisture in. It also fits A LOT of hair, which is exactly what I needed. I love that the elastic around the hairline doesn’t leave any marks. Totally worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shower cap ever
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shower cap and EXTREMELY well made. The durability is amazing, the fit is great, and I really like the look. The material is some sort of soft plastic. It's almost like a really sturdy shower liner material, but it's soft and doesn't crinkle and not at all stiff. The only thing I wish it had is a micro fiber liner inside so it could double as a night cap/turban, which would he AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Ewa Pinkowska

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely and really comfortable shower cap. The design is pretty and it looks so chic unlike ordinary shower caps. Also, it’s a pack of 3 so that was great!! I took off a star because the cap has a kind of fishy smell to it the first few uses from the material. It does disappear after a week or two though.
customer_reviews.author: Dimples

customer_reviews.title: Mold Everywhere After Only 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: After only three months there is mold growing all over the cap!! I hang it up to dry after every shower. Do not waste your money! This is not the high quality item and material it claims to be.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value, product not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit or cover around hair. The finished quality of the product was not as expected for that price. It was returned due to the discrepancy. There are a number of other products on amazon for a far better value prospective.
customer_reviews.author: James Peveler

customer_reviews.title: Elegantly Efficient
customer_reviews.text: This cap is elegantly efficient. It efficiently aids in conditioning. It efficiently aids in holding in moisture, and it efficiently aids in me looking elegant on wash day! Thanks again! A little something extra, is the need for it to be a little bigger to provide for more space due to the length of the consumers hair. With that being said, it efficiently meets my current needs!
customer_reviews.author: Shawnta

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick hair & purchased this after I got my hair done for Mother’s Day. I followed the instructions to ensure that I covered all my bases. Sadly my hair still got wet. For the price I was expecting it to work wonderfully but I was sadly mistaken.
customer_reviews.author: JAY301

customer_reviews.title: Material smells SO bad!!! Even after washing.
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package and this shower cap smells SO BAD. Like rank body odor. I washed it three times with heavy duty Tide and my boyfriend said it still smells so bad that I should throw it away. It sucks because the design is adorable and it fits my petite head.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute. I tie my hair up and wrap it before putting the Shower cap on and my hair doesn’t Touch a drop of water. The cap doesn’t end up smelling like most semi fabric caps do and it doesn’t slide down on my face. So good.
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, soft and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I gave this cap to my mother in law as she has been getting her hair “set” weekly and doesn’t want to ruin her hair on the shower. She loves this! She said it was really comfortable and easy to use. As she is on her 80’s that’s important. She likes that it is soft and said it was really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mchiochios

customer_reviews.title: A great shower cap, though a bit small for very thick long hair.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pattern on a well made cap. I have super thick hair so when I put it in a low bun (as instructed) it’s a bit small BUT it worked well. It’s worked out even better since I cut my hair above shoulder length so it’s not as much of a tight fit. Thick hair problems! I would definitely recommend this anyone who is looking for a stylish shower cap option.
customer_reviews.author: GhostStace

customer_reviews.title: putting the fun in functional
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe it took me as long as it did upgrade my showercap. Still using hotel amenity freebies? Release them. Still using cheap drug-store caps? Beneath your dignity. This is a cap to be proud of, one that does what it needs to do with style, no leaks, no drips, no wandering off and soaking parts of your head that don't need it. Plus, you'd look adorable wearing it. Most excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I have scalp psoriasis and I do oil treatments on my scalp several times a week. Going to bed with the traditional plastic shower caps were becoming a hassle. They’d slip, getting the oil all over pillowcases. This shower cap is a game changer. It’s comfortable. Stays in place, and helps the oil penetrate my scalp even further.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cute but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in mid July. So I estimate I have used this 30- 40 times. The elastic has come out of the front so now there is just a long ribbon hanging from one side, which complicates getting the thing on and also compromises its deflection of water. I guess it’s back to cheap shower cap that isn’t as cute but is reliable. I’m sad I splurged and paid $25 for a shower cap that didn’t even last 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cap, but small for us melon heads!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cap, but it is small. I have a lot of hair, and a big head. Wish it came in a bigger size!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Not the most attractive thing on me but no hair net is. Nice and tight. No water got in. Threw my old leaky shower cap away. Would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Singleton Samsung 7

customer_reviews.title: Chic shower look
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute. Only downfall is if you have big hair this may not work for you. Perfect for wrapped or straightened hair. I recommend making it a little larger. Or having a jumbo shower cap for hair versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is attractive and well made but is very small. I don’t think it would work for a lot of people. I have very short hair and it is too tight for me.
customer_reviews.author: MCC

customer_reviews.title: Cute pattern, easy to use, and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This Kitsch shower cap caught my eye because of the fun pattern and colors, but it's actually better quality than I expected. The material is soft instead of crinkly, so it doesn't sound like I'm inside a potato chip bag when I pull it over my ears. The instructions on the packaging were very clear and I got the cap on right and kept my hair dry through my shower the first time I used it. I also like that I'm using my beauty purchases to support a woman-owned company.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Grah

customer_reviews.title: 2nd day hair saver!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use instructions. Has a nice smooth band so no water gets in. It also has a non-slip grip on the edge too. This is a must have for preserving those second day waves!
customer_reviews.author: Mermaids and Macarons

customer_reviews.title: Not your mother's shower cap
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a more modern shower cap and this one delivered. Super comfortable and I have had no issues with unwanted water penetrating through!
customer_reviews.author: E. Tejada

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This cap is generally more than i would spend on a shower cap but it is so cute, comfortable and works so well. Very well made, cutely packaged and durable. Looking foward to using for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Emmalynne

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works good, probably works best for people with thicker hair. If it slides off my forehead my fine hair will just let it slide off. But alot better than the cheap shower caps.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great for deep condition, just make sure you wring our your hair first because otherwise water will drip on your shoulders. Otherwise, it does it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: Works well but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: It's super pretty and definitely keeps my hair dry. However, only after a cople months of use the inside lining is falling apart. For the price, I definitely expected this to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: K. West

customer_reviews.title: Smelly at first
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shower cap. It fits all of my hair and everything stays dry. Giving them a 4/5 because when I opened the bag with the cap inside it smelled HORRIBLE. Like the fishiest fish. Vom. I hand washed it and it still smelled lol. I let it air out for a month before it lost the smell - now it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: I want it, I got it

customer_reviews.title: Cute and keeps most of the hair dry
customer_reviews.text: Cutest shower cap ever owned. The bow on the top makes the cap but is also annoying since the gap allows hairs to poke out. Has kept most of my hair dry under the waterfall shower head.
customer_reviews.author: R.T.H

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get tight
customer_reviews.text: Can't get the shower cap to sit tight on my head without falling down over my eyes somehow. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: R. Emery

customer_reviews.title: Smells...
customer_reviews.text: I like the pattern however it has this smell that won’t go away! Idk if I should put it in the washing machine or what. But other than that, it does the job. But I am on the hunt for a higher quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Its comfortable and keeps my hair in the cap. The only thing is the elastic is at the back of the cap so you can only put it on back to front. Which can make it difficult to put your hair inside it. The color is bright and vibrant. The quality of the cap is really nice. Overall I would buy the shower cap again!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Fun Shower Cap
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is so fun! I love the Tropical design and the vibrant colors. This shower cap really does keep the water out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: So this shower cap is one of the better ones I’ve used but still not perfect. I like the design it’s cute.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am shipping this product back. The item is not comfortable or big enough for someone who has long hair
customer_reviews.author: teetee

customer_reviews.title: Quality cap that feels secure
customer_reviews.text: This is my first higher quality shower cap since I normally buy ones around $5. The difference is much nicer, and it creates a nice snug fit around my head for when I don’t want to get my hair wet. The design is very cute, and I enjoy the print! I think this will last me a long time :)
customer_reviews.author: Julienne

customer_reviews.title: Aloha!
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is super adorable! It fit me well and I have a lot of thick curly hair- however, upon taking it out of the package there was a funky/ musty smell. It did go away after a few days of use so no worries there! Not sure how long it will last, but it seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, high quality
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive, but it's high-quality fabric and it works very well. I have a fairly large head and can have trouble with these types of products, but it fit well with the elastic and didn't hurt or pinch. It's also cute and a fun pattern. I'll be using this a lot on the days I don't wash my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Although I feel like this is priced high, its better than the damage done from daily washing! I use this quite often! It has smelt like chemicals since I got it but it does the job well and keeps me dry while showering!
customer_reviews.author: Brian.lozar

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and ill fitting
customer_reviews.text: 2 issues with this: 1) it SMELLS like old fish, super gross. Maybe that will go away over time, but ick. 2) It is hard to get it to cover the hair on the sides of my head--I had to work with it for a few minutes to ensure all the pieces were tucked in. Overall, I do not think this is worth $24. I am going back to the $7 cap I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Gandolfi

customer_reviews.title: Works well and cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I do the curly girl method off and on and this is wonderful for non-wash days. Also doesn’t make me feel like a grandma because it’s cute. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A DeMartini

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but a money saver overall
customer_reviews.text: My head is definitely smaller so I wish there were sizes or some way to adjust it to be tighter on my head because water does get in some times at edges and makes hair line wet but otherwise everything stays dry and it’s very sturdy fabric unlike regular dollar store shower caps that rip after 4-5 uses
customer_reviews.author: Michael Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Great Cap
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this buy! The quality of the cap is nice and i much prefer it to the traditional plastic. It makes for a much more quiet shower and i love the cute design!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Cap was too small to effectively corral hair to keep it dry, and my hair is fairly short. Also serves to flatten hair. Have not had it long enough to assess durability. I recommend you keep looking for a better option.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Product has a horrible smell that I can not get rid of, even after washing. It also does not keep my hair from getting wet. Not a fan!
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: I like it !

product_meta.title: Kitsch Luxury Shower Cap for Women - Waterproof, Reusable Shower Caps (Palm Leaves)
product_meta.description:
Color:Palm LeavesBeautiful bath and shower caps from Kitsch combine style and functionality. Protect your hair from water and high humidity with the Kitsch Luxe Shower Cap. Great for the bath or shower, and comfortable for most head sizes. 
For the best fit, secure hair loosely at the nape of the neck and pull the shower cap up and over hair from the base of your neck, to your forehead. Tuck loose hairs around the face into the shower cap to ensure full protection from the shower and enjoy dry and styled hair straight out of the shower!
feature_bullets: BEAUTIFUL AND FUNCTIONAL: Look chic while you shower in this revolutionary shower cap. Pretty patterns, and a decorative bows make the Kitsch Shower Cap the most beautiful on the market.

FLEXIBLE FIT FOR MOST HEAD SIZES: 100% Nylon with elastic band to stretch and accommodate most head sizes. Simply secure hair in low bun at nape of neck and pull shower cap up and over the hair. Tuck in loose hairs along the hair line, and hop in the shower or bath with confidence.

WATERPROOF DESIGN SAVES DAY TWO HAIR: Waterproof, comfortable and chic. Functional & Fashionable! Avoid washing and styling your hair every day for healthier hair. Kitsch Shower Caps allow you to extend the life of a hair wash and style.
PERFECT FOR THE SHOWER OR BATH: Keep your locks dry and protected while you shower or bathe. The Kitsch Shower Cap is fully lined to protect hair from water.
CUTE PRINTS: Measures 10"x10"x6.5". Suitable for head circumference of up to 24". Shower cap is 6.5" tall. Designed in Los Angeles with Love.
